definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
Necessity is the mother of invention (European proverb).
pinyin: xu1 yao4 shi4 fa1 ming2 zhi1 mu3

sentences.english: If everyone keeps in line, we'll get through the Customs more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 要是大家都守制序，咱們會很快通過海關的。

sentences.english: This thing is supposed to be a whole number here.
Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌要是不死在十字架上，基督教就無法取得勝利。

sentences.english: If you had stayed out all night in the snow,you might have frozen to death.
sentences.chinese: 你要是在外面的雪地裏呆上一晚準會凍死。

sentences.english: We were all told to say that she was a lodger.
sentences.chinese: 要是別人問起來，我們只能說她是“一個租客”。

sentences.english: What if you mentally ate your fill?
sentences.chinese: 要是想像盡情喫個飽會怎樣？

sentences.english: If I were you, however, I would go south for one more league , and then take the fork west.
sentences.chinese: 我要是你，我就再向南走三英里，到達岔路後向西。

sentences.english: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.chinese: 要是不親熱有仁德的人，那將帶給咱們如許大的壞處。

sentences.english: I must have my share in the conversation, if you are speaking of music.
sentences.chinese: 要是你們談音樂，就得有我的份兒。

sentences.english: If this is love; is not fair.
sentences.chinese: 要是這就是愛情，素來就不平允。

sentences.english: If he should come tomorrow, we would be greatly surprised.
sentences.chinese: 要是他明天來了，我們會大感驚訝。

sentences.english: Of course, microwavable meals are nice when you worked late or are just way too busy.
sentences.chinese: 當然，要是下班太晚或太忙，微波爐蒸肉也不錯。

sentences.english: But what if gender discrimination is in fact happening?
sentences.chinese: 但要是真的有性別歧視存在又會怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: If you plan on not attending class, make sure you have a buddy that will sign u in.
sentences.chinese: 要是你打算蹺課，先保證有個傢夥能幫你簽到。

sentences.english: Maybe I might have the same effect with them, too.
sentences.chinese: 要是我是它們的話，或許也會這樣。

sentences.english: Remember- if you smoke proper after sex you're doing it too fast.
sentences.chinese: 記着，要是你在嘿咻後冒煙了，證明你整得太快了。

definition: just in case/if by any chance/contingency
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
when the moment comes/at that time
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
